title: Morning Window
author: Anya Mirel
description: Acrylic on canvas exploring morning light through layered translucent tones.

title: Glass Study
author: Matei Ionescu
description: Mixed-media work focused on reflections and fractured urban geometry.

title: Lightwell

title: Soft Focus
